levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vup>reduces dramatically</>, but the Arts damage dealt by every attack is only <@ba.vdown>{damage_scale:0%} of ATK</>
<@ba.rem>Cannot use Normal Attack when the skill is not activated</>
